localizedMeta.description:
The long-awaited visual novel is finally available in English!
* All features of this game are in English.

< Game Summary >
A mysterious girl from the future guides our protagonist to grasping a happy future.
Help the protagonist make life-changing decisions through a school romance visual novel leading to different heroins and alternate endings!

< Notifications >
Follow us on Twitter at @UxA_ADV for live updates on "Fragment's Note"!
* All tweets are in Japanese.

Package size: 476 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)
